# Area 
```{r} 
r <- 0.5
area_circulo <- 2 * pi * r
area_circulo
```  
# Area cuadrado 
```{r}
r <- 0.5
area_cuadrado <- r^2
area_cuadrado
```   

# Area Triangulo 
```{r}
x <- 0.5
y <- 0.8
area_triangulo <- (x * y) / 2
area_triangulo
```

# Area Trapecio 
```{r}
b <- 15
B <- 25
h <- 10
area_trapecio <- ((b + B) * h) / 2
area_trapecio
```
